Producer: Mark Polish, Paula Weinstein, Len Amato, Michael Polish
Production Co: Spring Creek Productions, Polish Brothers Construction
Synopsis: Charles Farmer (Billy Bob Thornton), a rancher who once trained to be an astronaut, decides to fulfill a lifelong dream: He builds a rocket in his barn and plans to pilot it into space. Though he faces foreclosure on his ranch, the disbelief of his neighbors and threats from the government, Charles remains determined to reach for the stars.
Title: The Astronaut farmer
